page.title: 20NEWS AND CREDITS
page.content: RAIL TRAIL - A Council ruling has ordered a halt to the digging on the rail trail. WITTON PARK - The Action Committee have opened a Memorial Garden and Play Area opposite the Environmental Centre. Their next objective is to improve Etherley station house in Witton Park, set up a BMX track, open walks and an adventure playground. TRAGIC SHOOTING - On 4th. March 1982, Detective Constable Jim Porter was shot dead during a wages snatch in Woodhouses. Prison sentences of Life, 12 and 5 years followed for three men. The Queen's Commendation for bravery, a plaque in his honour at Bishop Auckland Police Station, and a fund of Â£61 489 gave tribute to his bravery. CREDITS - We would like to thank the Residents of the area and the Northern Echo Newspaper for their cooperation.
